svg:

"What I cannot create, I cannot understand" - Richard Feynman"What I can create, I can also understand" - Analysis by SynthesisThe idea here is that if you are able to create a language model that can generate diverse coherent samples[sequences] then you can also create representations for words that can help you solve multiple NLP tasks.Why do we use language modelling task to train GPT?Why use auto regressive models?Intuition:Suppose you are writing the climax of the novel, for that you needto know what was happening at the earlier chapters and how the story line was progression to be able to generate words at the climaxAutoregressive Language Model is Universal
